scan_table_check.description: UI Actions that are configured for client-side execution must use an onClick function which name starts with "onClick" - e.g. "onClickResolveIncident" - to avoid name clashes with other functions that may be defined on the client side.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - UI Action onClick function naming
scan_table_check.resolution_details: If a function name is defined that does not start with "onClick" the function should be renamed in the Onclick field and in the functon definition in the script.
scan_table_check.short_description: Client-side UI Action onClick function name must start with "onClick"
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - UI Action onClick function naming
